text: Hansa Shipping AS is an Estonian shipping concern founded in 1999 in Tallinn, Estonia. The company provides chartering, crew management and ship management services. Currently Hansa Shipping operates a fleet of 30 dry cargo ships ranging in size from 4161 to 6663 DWT and deployed in the Baltic Sea, North Sea and the Mediterranean. Vast majority of the vessels are ice-classed and fly the EU flags. Category:Dry bulk shipping companies Category:Shipping companies of Estonia Category:Transport companies established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in Estonia
title: Hansa Shipping
